text: Bukhari Daud (25 October 1959 â€“ 11 February 2021) was an Indonesian English teacher and politician. He became the Regent of Aceh Besar from 2007 until 2012. Daud was born in Aceh Besar, Indonesia. Daud died on 11 February 2021 at a hospital in the Aceh Besar Regency from problems caused by a heart attack, aged 61. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Indonesian politicians Category:Indonesian educators Category:Aceh
title: Bukhari Daud
